HyperSpectral.ai is developing technology to make the Invisible Instantly Visible. As a HealthTech company we are creating a new speed category for identifying microparticles and pathogens affecting human health. Our tech combines "flash" data capture, AI and Analytics on an end-to-end platform.Why is this work important? We are in the final stages of development of a COVID-19 screening test that can provide accurate results in 30 seconds. This is exciting because the application for this technology goes far beyond COVID-19 -- think other pathogens, toxins, allergens and nutrition. All on our roadmap.The Role:The Strategy and Operations Manager is a critical role at an important time for HyperSpectral. The role is two parts: an internal strategy consultant who moves from initiative to initiative in different functional areas and an operational role to support the COO, CTO and the CEO.Specific duties and responsibilities will include, but are not limited to:Corporate DevelopmentBusiness StrategyRegulatory StatusBusiness/Channel/Partnership DevelopmentResearch and AnalysisBusiness OperationsCreation of prepared materials, content, and proposalsSupport multiple projects on an ongoing basisProvide input into the broader strategyThe Candidate:Ability to work collaboratively and with integrity; embody a corporate standard of active, capable and professional engagement with the assigned role. Detail-oriented multi-tasker who is able to prioritize workload and time effectivelyAbility to influence cross-functionally without direct authority and to work independently as well as part of a larger teamStrong business acumen and project management experience with established communication and interpersonal skillsCreative and pragmatic approach to operational and team mattersCollaborative approach to matrixed structure across multiple disciplines, groups and locations. Experience in making data driven decisions and strong financial modeling expertise Excellent written, verbal, and technical communications skillsExcels in a fast-paced startup environment and able to adapt quickly to changing business needsA big plus: Experience at a strategy consulting firm and/or working across multiple functions at a fast growing companyAnother big plus: Familiarity with the medtech and/or healthtech industries and understanding of big data, data analytics, artificial intelligence and machine learningThe BenefitsComprehensive Medical, Dental and Vision care plans for employees and dependentsHealth Savings AccountEmployee Assistance ProgramCommuter BenefitsGenerous time-off and leave policiesLife Insurance Disability InsuranceIf you have an entrepreneurial spirit and enjoy the energy of a high potential startup consider joining our small and incredibly dedicated team of eight full-time members supported by an engaged group of advisors.
